Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

i got a ****load of mods for my KSP ( about 10 ) but still, the lack of lights is really annoying ( i used to got those Omnilights from the B9 pack ). Is there any mods that got some parts to light up my vessels since B9 is not compatible with 0.23.5 ? ( the two from the KSP stock parts are really not that great !! )

Thanks !

( ps : sorry for my poor english, it's not my mother tongue )

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/surface-lights/

these ones are pretty good, and they work with the 23.5 tweaks to lights
B9 is compatible with .23.5 if you install these fixes.
I've always been happy with Aviation Lights if you're looking for "simple" and Lack Luster Labs if you're looking for lots of light-emissive crew quarters

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/surface-lights/

these ones are pretty good, and they work with the 23.5 tweaks to lights

Do they actually change colours beside the light when you change the colour settings?

This is my main problem with stock ones now. Even though the light they emit change they still have the same white/yellow colour when you look at the lights.

But anyways.. about mod lights.. There are also the aviation lights which work fine with 23.5. My only problem with them is that they are not tweakable and cause quite a bit of lag/frame rate drop even when they are not switched on.
